aParameterTooltip: Amplification coefficient. Higher values widen the range of low-slippages swaps, while lower values help keep the pool's composition balanced.
estimatedOutput: Output is estimated. If the price changes by more than the max slippage your transaction will revert.
highPriceImpactConfirmation: Warning: There is a high Price Impact on this transaction due either to the transaction's size or insufficient liquidity, which will result in a loss of funds. Please confirm that you understand before submitting your transaction.
infiniteApprovalTooltip: Allow Invader to spend all of the selected tokens now and in the future. You will not need to approve again.
lpMustStakeForRewards: Liquidity Providers: You must stake your LP tokens to receive rewards
poolIsNotAcceptingDeposits: Pool is not accepting additional deposits at this time
riskAdminKeys: Invader's admin keys are controlled by a 3/7 Gnosis Safe multisig, managed by the aras.haus DAO. This multisig is capable of pausing new deposits and trades in case of technical emergencies. Users will always be able to withdraw their funds, regardless of new deposits being paused. The multisig can also change the swap/withdrawal fees and the per pool/account deposit limits.
riskAudits: The Invader smart contracts are being submitted to
riskAudits3: Please keep in mind that security audits donâ€™t completely eliminate risks. Do not supply assets that you cannot afford to lose to Invader as a liquidity provider.
riskAudits4: Using Invader as an exchange user should be significantly less risky, but keep in mind there are still some risks.
riskIntro: THIS IS AN ALPHA DEPLOYMENT FOR TESTING ONLY, DO NOT USE. Invader [formerly ARAswap] is an aras.haus product. Before using the protocol, we highly recommend
riskIntro3: and understanding the risks involved with being a Liquidity Provider (LP) and/or using the AMM to trade pegged value crypto assets.
riskLossOfPeg: The ARA GIVES DAO, and aras.haus DAO, are seperate entities. While you can be sure that 50% of all admin fees will land in the ARA GIVES DAO Treasury, there is a chance that at some point in the future the community will vote to spend funds on for-profit activities. In order to combat this, for the first 24 months, the community will vote on which Charity to send the treasury to each quarter, however; the actual transfer will be handled by a multisig controlled by high networth individuals with no financial incentive to pirate the DAOs funds.

whichAssetPoolDoYouWantToChoose: Which asset pool do you want to choose?
yourRecentTransactions: Your recent transactions will be here.
